235531041.name: Activity Mod Socket
235531041.description: Activity mods provide additional currency and material rewards in various activities.

3545404847.name: Activity Mod Socket
3545404847.description: Available once the Ghost shell has been fully Masterworked.

4216349042.name: Experience Mod Socket
4216349042.description: Experience mods increase global experience gains.

1675508353.name: Economic Mod Socket
1675508353.description: Economic mods increase currency and resource gains from sources.

760030801.name: Tracking Mod Socket
760030801.description: Tracking mods increase the range of the detection of caches and resources out in the field.

1791833453.name: Resonant Elements
1791833453.description:
Obtain Resonant Elements from this weapon, which are used for shaping weapons. 

Can only be performed once per weapon, but leaves the weapon intact.

1666207338.name: Higher Purpose
1666207338.description:
This mask can be upgraded to increase damage to enemies and provide near-invulnerability while airborne. Unlock these upgrades by defeating Terrors in the Haunted Forest.

These perks are active only inside the Haunted Forest.

1666207339.name: Vampiric Touch
1666207339.description:
This mask can be upgraded to increase damage to challenging enemies and trigger health regeneration on precision kills. Unlock these upgrades by defeating Terrors in the Haunted Forest.

These perks are active only inside the Haunted Forest.

1666207336.name: Energetic Assassin
1666207336.description:
This mask can be upgraded to increase damage to Terrors and grant grenade and melee energy on precision kills. Unlock these upgrades by defeating Terrors in the Haunted Forest.

These perks are active only inside the Haunted Forest.

1410252468.name: Essence of Dawning
1410252468.description: An ingredient needed for all recipes. It embodies the spirit of the Dawning and can be found by completing activities and challenges anywhere in the system.

2161676424.name: Essence of Dawning
2161676424.description:
Essence of Dawning can be used to bake gifts in Eva's Holiday Oven.

Find essence by engaging in activities and completing challenges all over the system.

Available only during the Dawning.

3010348881.name: Vex Milk
3010348881.description:
Gained by defeating Vex opponents.

An ingredient that adds a bit of radiolarian liquid to anything it touches.

3010348880.name: Ether Cane
3010348880.description:
Gained by defeating Fallen opponents.

An ingredient that adds an ethereal sweetness to anything it touches.

3010348883.name: Cabal Oil
3010348883.description:
Gained by defeating Cabal opponents.

An ingredient that toughens and thickens up anything it touches.

3010348882.name: Chitin Powder
3010348882.description:
Gained by defeating Hive opponents.

An ingredient that adds a bit of spice to anything it touches.

3010348885.name: Taken Butter
3010348885.description:
Gained by defeating Taken opponents.

An ingredient that adds an echoing deliciousness to anything it touches.

3010348884.name: Dark Ether Cane
3010348884.description:
Gained by defeating Scorn opponents.

An ingredient that adds a darkly sweet aroma to anything it touches.

3010348887.name: Delicious Explosion
3010348887.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Grenade abilities.

Sudden and violent. And also tasty.

3010348886.name: Sharp Flavor
3010348886.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Swords.

A taste that will cut right through your taste buds.

3010348889.name: Impossible Heat
3010348889.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Solar damage.

Hotter than a Golden Gun on the surface of the sun.

3010348888.name: Electric Flavor
3010348888.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Arc damage.

It courses through everything we touch… and taste.

3331998400.name: Null Taste
3331998400.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Void damage.

Between the light and the dark lies deliciousness.

3331998401.name: Flash of Inspiration
3331998401.description:
Gained by generating Orbs of Power.

Just the right thing at just the right time.

3331998402.name: Personal Touch
3331998402.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Melee abilities.

A delicious taste achieved by getting up close and personal.

3331998403.name: Perfect Taste
3331998403.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Precision damage.

This flavor will hit the bull's-eye every time.

3331998404.name: Bullet Spray
3331998404.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Auto Rifles, Submachine Guns, and Heavy Machine Guns.

The more, the merrier.

3331998405.name: Finishing Touch
3331998405.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with finishers.

An ingredient that adds the necessary finishing touches to your recipe.

3331998406.name: Balanced Flavors
3331998406.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Bows, Sniper Rifles, Scout Rifles, and Pulse Rifles.

An ingredient that brings all the flavors in your recipe together.

3331998407.name: Pinch of Light
3331998407.description:
Gained by gathering Orbs of Power.

An ingredient that adds a touch of the Traveler's Light to your recipe.

3331998408.name: Multifaceted Flavors
3331998408.description:
Gained by rapidly defeating targets.

An ingredient that brings a depth of flavor to your recipe.

3331998409.name: Superb Texture
3331998409.description:
Gained by defeating opponents with Super abilities.

An ingredient that gives your recipe a pleasing texture.

3382331289.name: Dark Frosting
3382331289.description:
Gained by defeating targets with Stasis damage.

An ingredient that adds a decadently deep, rich flavor.

3770475779.name: Solstice Grasps (Drained)
3770475779.description: Hold too tight and it could all slip away.

1519942861.name: Solstice Vest (Drained)
1519942861.description: Memories of lost loves burn in your heart.

3970398144.name: Solstice Vest (Drained)
3970398144.description: Mistakes can burn, even in the dead of night.

1533101114.name: Solstice Mask (Drained)
1533101114.description: Hide your true face from the sun, lest you get burned.

1820842677.name: Solstice Strides (Drained)
1820842677.description: Jump not from the pan into the flames.

3770475778.name: Solstice Grasps (Renewed)
3770475778.description: Lift your arms high to welcome the power of the sun.

1519942860.name: Solstice Vest (Renewed)
1519942860.description: Let the feeling of reunion be in your heart.

1533101115.name: Solstice Mask (Renewed)
1533101115.description: Be renewed in mind and spirit.

1820842676.name: Solstice Strides (Renewed)
1820842676.description: Go in health and new vigor.

298089927.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Drained)
298089927.description: Sometimes the battle burns you up.

2047844849.name: Solstice Plate (Drained)
2047844849.description: Memories of the City burn in your heart.

4201697932.name: Solstice Mark (Drained)
4201697932.description: Battle scars may burn and leave a mark.

3389066870.name: Solstice Helm (Drained)
3389066870.description: Stare into the sun and get burned.

3345862921.name: Solstice Greaves (Drained)
3345862921.description: Go swift as a steed newly awakened.

298089926.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Renewed)
298089926.description: Lift and rise with renewed strength.

2047844848.name: Solstice Plate (Renewed)
2047844848.description: Let the spirit swell in your heart.

4201697933.name: Solstice Mark (Renewed)
4201697933.description: Wear the aspect of surging renewal.

3345862920.name: Solstice Greaves (Renewed)
3345862920.description: Rally and run with renewed vigor.

592288414.name: Solstice Gloves (Drained)
592288414.description: Heat can burn as much as it warms.

942888402.name: Solstice Robes (Drained)
942888402.description: Even the warmest light can sometimes burn you up.

1579706083.name: Solstice Bond (Drained)
1579706083.description: The brightest lights sometimes burn out fastest.

1518774295.name: Solstice Hood (Drained)
1518774295.description: Beloved cities burn in your mind's eye.

592288415.name: Solstice Gloves (Renewed)
592288415.description: Renewal can begin with just a spark.

942888403.name: Solstice Robes (Renewed)
942888403.description: A reawakening stirs deep within you and radiates outward.

1579706082.name: Solstice Bond (Renewed)
1579706082.description: Show them! You are here, awake at last!

1518774294.name: Solstice Hood (Renewed)
1518774294.description: The flame of reawakening ignites in your mind.

1011670905.name: Solstice Boots (Renewed)
1011670905.description: Run! For you are awake now and may never sleep again!

This map reveals a different Expedition weapon each time it is used.

1960049645.name: Halsiks
1960049645.description:
Receive buffs while Halsiks is in combat.

• Increased precision damage
• Faster grenade recharge

1960049644.name: SCUR-V
1960049644.description:
Receive buffs while SCUR-V the Servitor is in combat.

• Increased reload speed
• Faster class ability recharge

1960049647.name: The Skiffblades
1960049647.description:
Receive buffs while the Skiffblades are in combat.

• Increased melee damage
• Faster melee ability recharge

481860150.name: Wish-Dragon Teeth
481860150.description: Increases Tripmine Grenade duration and blast radius. Ability damage grants Tripmine Grenade energy.

481860151.name: Spring-Loaded Mounting
481860151.description: Increases Sidearm ready and reload speed. While you're critically wounded, swapping to a Sidearm increases its damage. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Sidearms.

593361146.name: Synapse Junctions
593361146.description: Quick successive attacks with Arc Staff increase its damage output and duration.

593361147.name: Probability Matrix
593361147.description: Increases the chaining capabilities of Arc Bolt Grenade and has a chance to recharge it each time it deals damage. A full chain always recharges.

593361144.name: Wraithmetal Mail
593361144.description: Dodging reloads all weapons and increases both movement and weapon handling speeds for a brief time.

2663272111.name: Upgraded Sensor Pack
2663272111.description: Provides radar while you're aiming. Enhances your radar resolution while crouched.

2663272110.name: Hawkeye Hack
2663272110.description: Modifies Golden Gun to fire a single high-damage shot. Enemies eliminated by the shot explode and grant you Super energy.

2663272109.name: Relentless Tracker
2663272109.description: Visually marks targets. Deals more damage to low-health marked targets. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

1694242448.name: Illegally Modded Holster
1694242448.description: When you ready a fully loaded Hand Cannon that deals Kinetic damage or a damage type that matches your subclass energy type, each hit from that Hand Cannon increases the damage of the next shot for a short time against a combatant. Hand Cannons ready faster and are more accurate immediately after swapping to them. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Hand Cannons while the buff is active.

1694242449.name: Uncanny Arrows
1694242449.description: Provides ability energy for each target tethered by Deadfall anchors. Moebius Quiver has an additional shot.

1694242450.name: Hydraulic Boosters
1694242450.description: Increases sprint speed and slide distance. Improves High Jump, Strafe Jump, and Triple Jump. The airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons receives a large penalty.

1155472386.name: Fury Conductors
1155472386.description: Melee hits build energy. Being struck by a melee attack reduces incoming damage and unleashes the energy in a devastating explosion.

1155472387.name: Horns of Doom
1155472387.description:
Void melee kills give Super energy.
While Sentinel Shield is active, melee kills recharge Shield Throw, which extends your Super on hits.

1155472384.name: Biotic Enhancements
1155472384.description: Increased melee lunge range. Improved melee and Super damage when you're surrounded.

1667892710.name: Survival Well
1667892710.description: Generates an additional Orb of Power from Supers and a healing pulse when Barricade is activated.

1667892711.name: Auto-Loading Link
1667892711.description: Steadily reloads a portion of your equipped Auto Rifle's or Machine Gun's magazine from reserves. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Auto Rifles and Machine Guns.

1667892708.name: Sunfire Furnace
1667892708.description: Improves the recharge rate of your Solar abilities. Greatly improves recharge rate while your Super is charged. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

3662465907.name: Transfusion Matrix
3662465907.description: Kills with Arc melee abilities trigger health regeneration and restore melee energy.

3662465906.name: Dreaded Visage
3662465906.description: Grants ability energy when you're damaged. When critically wounded, regain maximum health on kills.

3241194940.name: Jump Jets
3241194940.description: Provides additional aerial maneuverability and enables accurate hipfire while you're in the air during Lift. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons while hipfiring.

3241194941.name: Mecha Holster
3241194941.description: Reloads stowed Submachine Guns and allows you to ready them instantly. Improves your handling with Submachine Guns and your movement while wielding one. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Submachine Guns.

3241194942.name: Linear Actuators
3241194942.description: Increases sprint speed. Sprinting builds up a static charge. After melee-attacking an enemy, that charge will chain damage to nearby enemies.

2731901711.name: Helium Spirals
2731901711.description: Increases the duration of Solar Grenades. Solar melee kills grant unlimited Solar Grenade energy for a brief time.

2731901710.name: Vampire's Caress
2731901710.description: Melee kills instantly restore a large amount of health and continue to restore health afterwards for a short duration.

2731901709.name: Warlord's Sigil
2731901709.description: Eliminating enemies with melee attacks increases your melee damage.

926349161.name: Fusion Harness
926349161.description: Fusion Grenades have an additional charge and recharge from empowered weapon damage. Fusion Grenade kills grant Rift energy.

926349160.name: Tome of Dawn
926349160.description: When Dawnblade is equipped, aiming weapons while you're midair suspends you there for a short time, improving airborne accuracy, reducing incoming flinch, and granting damage resistance. Weapon hits extend this effect's duration. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

3927963102.name: Actual Grandeur
3927963102.description: Provides additional damage resistance during Nova Bomb. Nova Bomb kills grant Super energy.

3927963103.name: Conduction Tines
3927963103.description: Arc ability or Jolt final blows increase the recharge rate of your Arc abilities and extend the duration of Stormtrance.

3927963100.name: Cerebral Uplink
3927963100.description: Highlights priority targets and improves the regeneration speed of your grenade, melee, and Rift abilities. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

3927963101.name: Abyssal Extractors
3927963101.description: Void-damage kills increase ability energy recharge rate.

3347978673.name: Strange Protractor
3347978673.description: Sprint speed increased. After a short time sprinting, your currently equipped weapon is automatically reloaded.

3347978672.name: Alchemical Etchings
3347978672.description: Your Rifts gain the additional ability to increase weapon reload speeds. Empowering Rift makes weapons effective over longer ranges.

3777829357.name: Aeon Energy
3777829357.description:
Dodging grants the following to nearby Aeon Cult allies:
Grenade energy to Warlocks
Melee energy to Titans
Dodge energy to Hunters

Other allies receive a fraction of the shared energy.

4024170927.name: Misdirection
4024170927.description: Dodging disorients nearby enemies and temporarily removes their radar.

1236444985.name: Aeon Energy
1236444985.description:
Melee grants the following to nearby Aeon Cult allies:
Grenade energy to Warlocks
Melee energy to Titans
Dodge energy to Hunters

Other allies receive a fraction of the shared energy.

2355041704.name: Solar Rampart
2355041704.description: Solar damage kills recharge your Barricade, which unleashes a blast of Solar energy when summoned.

536311848.name: Aeon Energy
536311848.description:
Throwing grenades grants the following to nearby Aeon Cult allies:
Grenade energy to Warlocks
Melee energy to Titans
Dodge energy to Hunters

Other allies receive a fraction of the shared energy.

1142806944.name: Planetary Torrent
1142806944.description: Rifts release an Arc shockwave when cast. Rift energy recharges faster when you are surrounded by enemies.

3907299874.name: New Tricks
3907299874.description: Improves Skip Grenade, and you gain an additional Skip Grenade charge. Skip Grenade returns energy when it damages enemies.

2119325971.name: Vanishing Shadow
2119325971.description: Increases the duration of any invisibility effects. While you are invisible, your melee recharges faster, your weapons reload faster, and your Recovery is greatly increased.

1331592343.name: Starless Night
1331592343.description: Targets that enter Ward of Dawn are blinded, while allies that pass through gain a Void overshield. Guarding with Sentinel Shield blinds nearby targets.

824488952.name: Seriously, Watch Out
824488952.description: Grants an overshield when you're sprinting at full health with Seismic Strike, Hammer Strike, or Shield Bash equipped and charged. Hits with these abilities recharge a portion of your melee energy.

1147638875.name: Cobra Totemic
1147638875.description: Weapons ready and reload very quickly. Melee range is extended. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.

722862450.name: Dearly Departed
722862450.description: Your Rift provides damage reduction to allied Guardians standing in it. Grants Rift energy when you are critically wounded. On your death, creates a healing rift on your corpse.

3898143407.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Scorched)
3898143407.description: Sometimes the battle burns you up.

1860355337.name: Solstice Plate (Scorched)
1860355337.description: Memories of the City burn in your heart.

3640658628.name: Solstice Mark (Scorched)
3640658628.description: Battle scars may burn and leave a mark.

374780030.name: Solstice Helm (Scorched)
374780030.description: Stare into the sun and get burned.

4048186065.name: Solstice Greaves (Scorched)
4048186065.description: Go swift as a steed newly awakened.

87994267.name: Solstice Gauntlets (Rekindled)
87994267.description: Lift and rise with renewed strength.

3908760309.name: Solstice Plate (Rekindled)
3908760309.description: Let the spirit swell in your heart.

2989132488.name: Solstice Mark (Rekindled)
2989132488.description: Wear the aspect of surging renewal.

3257562381.name: Solstice Greaves (Rekindled)
3257562381.description: Rally and run with renewed vigor.

1936281116.name: Solstice Gloves (Scorched)
1936281116.description: Heat can burn as much as it warms.

2266517764.name: Solstice Robes (Scorched)
2266517764.description: Even the warmest light can sometimes burn you up.

3010244697.name: Solstice Bond (Scorched)
3010244697.description: The brightest lights sometimes burn out fastest.

1283615405.name: Solstice Hood (Scorched)
1283615405.description: Beloved cities burn in your mind's eye.

2816485244.name: Solstice Gloves (Rekindled)
2816485244.description: Renewal can begin with just a spark.

3840083172.name: Solstice Robes (Rekindled)
3840083172.description: A reawakening stirs deep within you and radiates outward.

713403449.name: Solstice Bond (Rekindled)
713403449.description: Show them! You are here, awake at last!

2163922573.name: Solstice Hood (Rekindled)
2163922573.description: The flame of reawakening ignites in your mind.

1819413126.name: Solstice Boots (Rekindled)
1819413126.description: Run! For you are awake now and may never sleep again!

2323170449.description: [Brake]  : Use while airborne to release roll stabilizers, and move [Movement] to roll.

1449897497.name: Sharp Edges
1449897497.description: Hits and kills with Blade Barrage will return Super energy after the Super ends.

1449897496.name: Adamantine Brace
1449897496.description: Bow charges can be held indefinitely. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Bows.

2192678014.name: Roving Assassin
2192678014.description: Each Spectral Blades kill you make before going into stealth will restore more of your Super energy.

4190535237.name: Ursine Guard
4190535237.description: Move faster while guarding when Sentinel Shield is active. Guarded damage converts to Super energy when the Super ends.

699693452.name: Vengeance
699693452.description: Highlights the target who dares to damage you. Track down and destroy them for an overshield.

1919923227.name: Overflowing Light
1919923227.description: Using an ability (grenade, melee, or Barricade) empowers the other two abilities. Empowered means abilities have faster regen, melees and grenades do more damage, and Barricades have more hit points.

242794439.name: Reflective Vents
242794439.description: Improved slide. Sliding after sprinting for a short time reflects incoming projectiles.

8507332.name: Chaotic Exchanger
8507332.description: Resist incoming damage while charging your Void grenade. Charged Void grenades return grenade energy on a hit.

2204713148.name: Crystalline Transistor
2204713148.description:
Crystalline Transistor
Precision final blows with your Kinetic weapon create an explosion in the element of your subclass.

2204713149.name: Battle-Hearth
2204713149.description: Kills and assists you make while standing in your Well of Radiance return Super energy.

1939153390.name: Close Enough
1939153390.description: Damaging targets with Chaos Reach extends its duration.

1484442054.name: Monte Carlo Method
1484442054.description: Dealing damage with this weapon reduces your melee cooldown and grants a chance to fully charge your melee ability with each kill.

1797707170.name: Judgment
1797707170.description: Sustained damage with this weapon envelops the target in a field that weakens and stuns them. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

411799453.name: Dark Deliverance
411799453.description:
Fires remotely detonated projectiles that drop Void orbs on combatants.
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

3174300811.name: Looks Can Kill
3174300811.description: This weapon fires special shield-piercing ammunition. It comes with a scope. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

1699724249.name: Big-Game Hunter
1699724249.description: Fires a massive heavy bolt that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

3333994164.name: Dark Descent
3333994164.description: The further a Void orb falls, the more powerful its detonation becomes.

2399646028.name: Leviathan's Sigh
2399646028.description: When fully drawn, the bolt creates a large concussive blast that knocks combatants back.

3551326236.name: Rampage
3551326236.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.

2814973067.name: Markov Chain
2814973067.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon. Melee kills grant ammo for this weapon.

1687327062.name: Death at First Glance
1687327062.description: Bonus damage when aiming down sights on the opening shot of an attack. This bonus is preserved if the shot deals precision damage or strikes an elemental shield.

1185480639.name: Penance
1185480639.description: Targets under the effects of Judgment long enough are struck with a burst of damage.

265542500.name: Chain Bowstring
265542500.description:
Heavy-duty bowstring. Cabal design.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Increases stability

1844314558.name: Parting Gift
1844314558.description:
Dodging leaves behind an explosive that detonates after a short delay, damaging targets around it and creating a secondary effect based on your subclass energy type:
• [Arc] Blinds targets.
• [Solar] Scorches targets.
• [Void] Suppresses targets.
• [Stasis] Slows targets.

1095471953.name: Embers of Light
1095471953.description: Defeating combatants or Guardians while Daybreak is active creates a healing and empowering rift at their location. While standing in any rift, [Solar] Solar weapon final blows grant Rift energy. When your Rift energy is full, final blows consume your Rift energy and create a healing and empowering rift at the target's location.

3449001998.name: Spheromatik Trigger
3449001998.description: Powered melee final blows unleash a damaging explosion. Finishers and final blows against more powerful targets increase the radius and damage of the explosion.

• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.

• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.

2655746324.name: Empty Mod Socket
2655746324.description:
No mod currently selected.

You can select Charged with Light mods, Warmind Cell mods, and Elemental Well mods to use in this socket.

4251375227.name: Mobius Conduit
4251375227.description: [Super]  : Deactivate Whirlwind Guard early. Whirlwind Guard consumes energy more slowly when not attacking, and guarding does not consume extra Super energy.

1828251441.name: Assault Barricade
1828251441.description: You and your allies can shoot through your Towering Barricade, which has reduced health and duration.

622433369.name: Warlord's End
622433369.description: Powered melee final blows create a burst of energy that weakens nearby targets. Finishers and final blows against more powerful targets increase the radius of the burst and the length of the weakening effect.

302488496.name: Spirit of Competition
302488496.description: During Guardian Games 2020, completing Crucible matches, Gambit matches, Vanguard strikes, patrols, adventures, and forges grants additional Glimmer and XP rewards.

3837077246.name: Rewind Again
3837077246.description: Precision shots and shots against combatants slowed or frozen by Stasis will return to the magazine.

2909403175.name: Mortal Polarity
2909403175.description: Precision final blows generate a lightning bolt at the target's location.

2179914730.name: Banshee's Wail
2179914730.description:
[Block]  : Hold to rev the blade.
 • Increases damage and adds [Shield-Piercing] shield piercing to all attacks.
 • Gain stacks when dealing damage with revved attacks.
 • Additional stacks increase the damage and damage resistance of heavy attacks.

2200569208.name: Eyes on All
2200569208.description: This weapon is capable of tracking and firing at multiple targets simultaneously.

536517534.name: Compression Chamber
536517534.description: Fires a pellet spread in hip-fire or a single high-damage slug while aiming.

1315870387.name: Cryocannon
1315870387.description:
[Shoot]  : Hold to charge; release to fire.
This weapon's projectiles create Stasis crystals and freeze nearby targets.

213689231.name: Paracausal Shot
213689231.description: Final blows and precision hits with Hawkmoon grant stacks of Paracausal Charge. The final round in the magazine deals bonus damage based on the number of stacks. Stowing Hawkmoon on the final round removes this bonus.

4049631843.name: One for All
4049631843.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.

859780267.name: One for All
859780267.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for an improved duration.

3436462433.name: Surplus
3436462433.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.

2658083589.name: Surplus
2658083589.description: Substantially increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.

2726471870.name: Thresh
2726471870.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.

1172413778.name: Thresh
1172413778.description: Defeating combatants with this weapon generates an improved small amount of Super energy.

25606670.name: Dual Loader
25606670.description: Reloads two shells at a time, but reduces reload speed.

3143051906.name: Dual Loader
3143051906.description: Reloads three shells at a time, but reduces reload speed.

3556949035.name: Time-Slip
3556949035.description: At 10 stacks of Rewind Again, a small portal will open, shooting bullets from an alternate timeline version of this weapon. Precision hits extend the portal's duration.

3117514172.name: Stormbringer
3117514172.description: Rapid precision hits create a lightning storm at the point of impact.

290014589.name: Revved Consumption
290014589.description: Damaging a combatant heals the wielder.

3937312904.name: On Black Wings
3937312904.description: Pellet final blows grant a stacking precision damage and reload speed buff. Precision hits with slugs extend the duration.

469285294.name: Recombination
469285294.description: Elemental final blows increase the damage of this weapon's next shot.

3335686050.name: Recombination
3335686050.description: Elemental final blows increase the damage of this weapon's next shot. Increases range.

2396489472.name: Chain Reaction
2396489472.description: Each final blow with this weapon creates an elemental damage explosion.

598607952.name: Chain Reaction
598607952.description: Each final blow with this weapon creates an elemental damage explosion. Improves ammo reserves.

3201496230.name: Redirection
3201496230.description: Damaging rank-and-file combatants increases damage against more powerful ones.

1545231802.name: Redirection
1545231802.description: Damaging rank-and-file combatants substantially increases damage against more powerful ones.

3592538738.name: Wellspring
3592538738.description: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.

2675361166.name: Wellspring
2675361166.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.

1281243303.name: Adaptive Ordnance
1281243303.description: Killing four or more combatants in a single volley increases the damage of the next volley.

1523832109.name: Reconstruction
1523832109.description: This weapon slowly reloads itself over time, up to double capacity.

461595545.name: Reconstruction
461595545.description: This weapon slowly reloads itself over time, up to more than double capacity.

1549056416.name: Flash Freeze
1549056416.description: Charging this weapon increases the freeze radius and amount of Stasis crystals created.

712324018.name: Transformative
712324018.description: Future drops of this weapon will have random rolls.

2518716062.name: Aggressive Frame
2518716062.description: High damage, moderate charge time. Fires a horizontal volley.

692285813.name: Light Shift
692285813.description: Replaces your Stasis subclass dodge ability with a longer range, faster moving shift that partially cloaks you during use. After shifting, your Arc weapons deal increased damage to combatants for a short time, and you deal increased damage to all slowed or frozen combatants.

3663096260.name: Skittering Stinger
3663096260.description:
Weighted Knife gains a second bounce. Rapid precision hits with your weapons grant Weighted Knife a significant damage bonus and the ability to stun unshielded combatants for a short time.

Empowered Weighted Knife is strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

2799418574.name: Rites of Ember
2799418574.description: Your Daybreak projectiles cause targets to scorch on contact. Your scorch effects deal more damage, and you gain a small amount of melee energy each time your scorch effects damage a target.

3824622015.name: Grasp of the Devourer
3824622015.description:
Damaging combatants poisons them, dealing increasing damage over time. Defeating a poisoned combatant spreads the condition.

Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all Weapons of Sorrow.

2979726427.name: Kintsugi
2979726427.description: Final blows from weapons with a damage type matching your subclass energy create a burst of healing around you. After reviving or being revived, you gain an aura that provides overshields to you and nearby allies.

185514250.name: Glacial Guard
185514250.description: Replaces your Barricade ability with a personal overshield. When you activate your Barricade, you create a burst around yourself that slows combatants. While you have the overshield, you are slowed and Barricade does not recharge.

3121526952.name: Last Wish Armor
3121526952.description: This armor can equip Last Wish armor mods in its general socket.

306579422.name: Garden of Salvation Armor
306579422.description: This armor can equip Garden of Salvation armor mods in its general socket.

1713959253.name: Deep Stone Crypt Armor
1713959253.description: This armor can equip Deep Stone Crypt armor mods in its general socket.

3933525366.name: Marksman's Dodge
3933525366.description: Dodge to perform an evasive maneuver with a steady hand. Dodging automatically reloads your weapon.

3933525367.name: Gambler's Dodge
3933525367.description: Dodge to perform a deft tumble, avoiding enemy attacks. Dodging near enemies fully recharges your Melee Ability.

3260056808.name: Towering Barricade
3260056808.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.

3260056809.name: Rally Barricade
3260056809.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases weapon reload speed, stability, and range when you stand behind it.

3492047641.name: Healing Rift
3492047641.description: Conjure a well of power that continuously heals those inside it.

3492047640.name: Empowering Rift
3492047640.description: Conjure a well of power that increases weapon damage for those inside it.

1399217.name: Glacier Grenade
1399217.description: A grenade that creates walls out of [Stasis] Stasis crystals to block damage and freeze targets; these walls can be shattered for damage.

1399216.name: Duskfield Grenade
1399216.description: A grenade that shatters on impact, leaving behind a field that slows targets and freezes those who do not leave the volume.

1399219.name: Coldsnap Grenade
1399219.description: A grenade that freezes on impact and sends another seeker to find and freeze targets.

1341767667.name: Withering Blade
1341767667.description:
Toss a [Stasis] Stasis Shuriken at targets to damage and slow them.  

Provides multiple charges.

2028772231.name: Shiver Strike
2028772231.description: Hold input to leap through the air. Releasing unleashes a powerful dash attack that knocks targets back and damages them.

2543177538.name: Penumbral Blast
2543177538.description: Raise your [Stasis] Stasis staff against your foe. Send a blast of [Stasis] Stasis forward to freeze your targets.

3531427694.name: High Jump
3531427694.description: While airborne, jump a second time to reach greater heights.

3531427695.name: Strafe Jump
3531427695.description: While airborne, jump a second time with strong directional control.

3531427692.name: Triple Jump
3531427692.description: While airborne, sustain your air control with a second or third jump.

469281040.name: High Lift
469281040.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air to greater heights.

469281041.name: Strafe Lift
469281041.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.

469281042.name: Catapult Lift
469281042.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.

890263313.name: Strafe Glide
890263313.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.

890263312.name: Burst Glide
890263312.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.

890263315.name: Balanced Glide
890263315.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.

2625980631.name: Silence and Squall
2625980631.description:
Summon two Stasis kamas, Silence and Squall, that you throw one after another.

Silence : Creates a flash-freeze blast that freezes and damages targets.

Squall : Creates a Stasis Storm that slows and damages targets caught inside.

2021620139.name: Glacial Quake
2021620139.description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis gauntlet. While your Super is active:

[Heavy Attack]  : Slam your gauntlet down to create a shockwave that freezes targets and sends out [Stasis] Stasis crystals to freeze additional ones.

[Light Attack]  : Supercharge your Shiver Strike for bonus damage. Sprint through [Stasis] Stasis crystals or frozen targets to shatter them instantly.

3683904166.name: Winter's Wrath
3683904166.description:
Summon a [Stasis] Stasis staff. While your Super is active:

[Super Primary]  : Cast out a barrage of [Stasis] Stasis shards that freeze targets.

[Super Secondary]  : Cast out a shockwave that shatters all frozen targets.

4104185692.name: Frenzy

3007133316.name: Frenzy

3610750208.name: Timeless Mythoclast
3610750208.description: This weapon fires full auto when in its default firing mode.

2946784966.name: Tunnel Vision
2946784966.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for a short duration.

987673306.name: Tunnel Vision
987673306.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for an improved duration.

960810156.name: Danger Zone
960810156.description: The blast radius of this weapon increases when surrounded by combatants.

1077019636.name: Danger Zone
1077019636.description:
The blast radius of this weapon increases when surrounded by combatants.
Base blast radius is also improved.

1385518514.name: Liquid Cooling
1385518514.description: Direct hits by a charged shot instantly freeze the target. Indirect hits freeze combatants and slow opposing Guardians.

1799762209.name: Cornered
1799762209.description: Faster charge time or draw time when surrounded by combatants.

1008128453.name: Cornered
1008128453.description: Faster charge time or draw time when surrounded by combatants. Improves stability.

3824105627.name: Firefly
3824105627.description: Precision kills with this weapon increase reload speed and cause the target to explode, dealing Solar damage to nearby enemies.

1183436451.name: Firefly
1183436451.description: Precision final blows with this weapon substantially increase reload speed and cause the target to explode, dealing Solar damage to nearby targets.

11612903.name: Adrenaline Junkie
11612903.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.

2422968039.name: Adrenaline Junkie
2422968039.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon for an improved duration.

1570042021.name: Heating Up
1570042021.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil.

2748258257.name: Heating Up
2748258257.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil for a longer duration.

3418782618.name: Rewind Rounds
3418782618.description: When this weapon's magazine is empty, it refills from reserves based on the number of hits.

1563455254.name: Rewind Rounds
1563455254.description: When this weapon's magazine is empty, it refills from reserves based on the number of hits. Improves range.

806917387.name: Temporal Unlimiter
806917387.description:
Defeating targets builds stacks of Overcharge.

[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap firing modes when fully Overcharged.

In alternative firing mode, hold the trigger to charge up and fire more powerful linear fusion shots.

185041502.name: Volatile Battery
185041502.description:
This battery simultaneously exists in multiple timelines, causing the weapon to Overcharge.

  •  Greatly increases magazine size

4048389864.name: Feast of Light
4048389864.description: You gain additional Super energy from Orbs of Power you pick up. While your Super energy is full, picking up an Orb of Power overcharges your Super, causing you to gain a burst of healing when cast and a bonus to your Super damage. At maximum overcharge, you also gain an overshield.

2500502982.name: Firewalker
2500502982.description: Solar final blows periodically grant you an escalating bonus to weapon damage. You are harder to slow or freeze with Stasis, and when you break out, you take no damage from doing so, creating a burst of Solar energy around yourself.

902934539.name: Blessing of Order
902934539.description: Standing in a healing rift creates Noble Seekers that seek out allies that are not in a rift and heal them. Standing in an empowering rift creates Noble Seekers that grant both you and your ally a damage bonus. Each time a Noble Seeker finds one of your allies, the duration of your rift is briefly extended while you are standing in it. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of the Hand Cannon Lumina.

1753939277.name: Splicer Gauntlet Projection
1753939277.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

1753939276.name: Infinity Door Projection
1753939276.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

51305743.name: Vitreous Entrance
51305743.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

51305742.name: Harpy Entrance
51305742.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

117669763.name: The Dance
117669763.description: Activating your dodge ability while near targets allows you to dodge additional times for a short period.

569260333.name: Force Multiplier
569260333.description: When you have full Void melee energy, Shotgun final blows grant a Void overshield and consume your melee energy. Shotgun final blows also give you melee energy. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Shotguns.

395373724.name: Scatter Charge
395373724.description: You gain an additional Scatter Grenade charge. Enables tracking for Scatter Grenade projectiles.

2472875850.name: Iron Lord's Pride
2472875850.description: Grants a chance to receive an Enhancement Prism as a reward at the end of Iron Banner matches. Each piece of armor you are wearing with this perk on it increases the chance of receiving an Enhancement Prism, to a maximum of 4 items.

2965975126.description: Fires a stream of sentient, toxic projectiles that track the targeted enemy.

3441203855.name: Void Leech
3441203855.description: This weapon leeches Void debuffs when damaging targets that are suppressed, weakened, or volatile. Once charged, [Alternate Weapon Action]  to swap firing modes. In this mode, damage from this weapon applies the same Void debuffs that were leeched.

2733244971.name: Trinary Vision
2733244971.description: One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher. Projectiles release a fan of three energy waves on contact with the ground.

1174163613.name: Worm's Hunger
1174163613.description: This weapon fires Hive worms which explode on impact. The size and damage of the explosion scales with the number of enemies you've defeated just before firing this weapon.

2940035732.name: Wrath of the Colossus
2940035732.description: Heavy slug launcher that charges, then fires full auto while the trigger is held.

4091460919.name: One Quiet Moment
4091460919.description: Grants increased reload speed when out of combat.

515704826.name: Gun and Run
515704826.description: Rapidly defeating targets with this weapon grants bonus sprint speed. Guardians, powerful combatants, and high-value targets grant this bonus quicker.

1702976605.name: Classy Contender
1702976605.description: Final blows with this weapon grant class ability energy.

3989629871.name: Skulking Wolf
3989629871.description: While at low health, Guardian final blows with this weapon grant enhanced radar and remove you from opposing radar.

1281216113.name: Stunning Recovery
1281216113.description: Stunning a Champion partially refills your magazine, triggers health regeneration, and improves recovery for a short duration.

3363267119.name: Souldrinker
3363267119.description: Gain health based on the number of hits before reloading.

1536798515.name: Land Tank
1536798515.description: Final blows with this weapon grant increased Resilience and additional damage resistance from combatants.

883366072.name: Psychohack
883366072.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

744217850.name: Vanguard's Vindication
744217850.description: Final blows with this weapon grant a small amount of health.

4008116374.name: Suros Synergy
4008116374.description: Reloading grants this weapon bonus handling and reduces incoming flinch for a short time.

1607056502.name: Hakke Breach Armaments
1607056502.description: This weapon deals increased damage against vehicles, turrets, barricades, and Stasis crystals.

2839173408.name: Omolon Fluid Dynamics
2839173408.description: This weapon has increased reload speed and stability for the top half of the magazine.

3988215619.name: Veist Stinger
3988215619.description: Damaging an enemy with this weapon has a small chance to reload the magazine and increase movement speed while aiming down sights. Bows receive faster draw speed and swords receive faster charge rate while this perk is active.

844190854.name: Lightning Seeker
844190854.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot track targets across the ground and unleash chain lightning on impact.

2379536009.name: Remote Shield
2379536009.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot deploy a protective shield on impact.

3492337375.name: Restorative Turret
3492337375.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot deploy a healing turret on impact.

4015745376.name: Toxic Overload
4015745376.description: Landing a final blow or multiple precision hits triggers a burst that poisons nearby targets.

1408800487.name: Omega Strike
1408800487.description: Land hits with the slug launcher to load missiles,[Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to launch several missiles in a volley.

2395713912.name: Umbral Sustenance
2395713912.description: This weapon's magazine is automatically reloaded when you gain Devour, a Void overshield, or become invisible.

1679262379.name: Worm Byproduct
1679262379.description: Taking damage from your own worm projectile detonation empowers your weapons for a short time.

1048183818.name: Adaptive Munitions
1048183818.description: This weapon adapts its damage output and effectiveness against energy shields that don't match the weapon's damage type.

3431277734.name: Adaptive Munitions
3431277734.description: This weapon adapts its damage output to be more effective against energy shields that don't match its damage type. Improves damage increase.

1583705720.name: Stats for All
1583705720.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.

1409206216.name: Stats for All
1409206216.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for an improved duration.

2209918983.name: Turnabout
2209918983.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.

2000295559.name: Turnabout
2000295559.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield for an improved duration.

2896038713.name: Focused Fury
2896038713.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.

2402480669.name: Focused Fury
2402480669.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage for an improved duration. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.

3526486541.name: Tilting at Windmills
3526486541.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases movement speed while shielding.

1738338041.name: Tilting at Windmills
1738338041.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases movement speed for an improved duration while you are shielding.

2224838837.name: Unstoppable Force
2224838837.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases projectile damage for a short time.

3102670337.name: Unstoppable Force
3102670337.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases projectile damage for an improved duration.

3800201097.name: Immovable Object
3800201097.description: Dealing ranged damage grants increased weapon energy while you're stationary with your shield raised.

3674673997.name: Immovable Object
3674673997.description: Dealing ranged damage grants substantially increased weapon energy while you're stationary with your shield raised.

2652708987.name: Successful Warm-Up
2652708987.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.

617966211.name: Successful Warm-Up
617966211.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed for an improved duration.

509074078.name: Steady Hands
509074078.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.

843318450.name: Steady Hands
843318450.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a longer duration.

671806388.name: Compulsive Reloader
671806388.description: Grants increased reload speed when close to full magazine.

595108252.name: Compulsive Reloader
595108252.description: Grants greatly increased reload speed when close to full magazine.

3078487919.name: Bait and Switch
3078487919.description: Deal damage with all equipped weapons within a short time to give this weapon a damage boost.

3744057135.name: Bait and Switch
3744057135.description: Deal damage with all equipped weapons within a short time to give this weapon a damage boost for an improved duration.

2172504645.name: Sleight of Hand
2172504645.description: Final blows with weapons or abilities while this weapon is stowed increase its handling, stability, and reload speed for a short duration.

1172098417.name: Sleight of Hand
1172098417.description: Final blows with weapons or abilities while this weapon is stowed increase its handling, stability, and reload speed for an improved duration.

2978966579.name: Chill Clip
2978966579.description: Direct hits with the top half of the magazine cause a detonation that slows nearby targets.

344235611.name: Chill Clip
344235611.description: Direct hits with the top half of the magazine cause a detonation that slows nearby targets. Stability is improved.

1263609309.description:
Power diverted from shield.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases shield duration

1934171651.description:

  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases reload speed
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

5699512.name: Tempered Truss Rod
5699512.description:

  •  Slightly decreases reload speed
  •  Slightly decreases range

2713678205.name: Low-Impedance Windings

  •  Slightly increases reload speed
  •  Decreases range

580685494.name: Auxiliary Reserves

  •  Greatly increases shield duration
  •  Decreases reload speed

594346985.name: Lightweight Emitter

Weight reduction for better agility.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
  •  Decreases shield duration

2197832433.description: Equip this ornament on any eligible Legendary armor item to change its appearance. Once you get a universal ornament, it's unlocked for all characters of the relevant class on your account.

921817150.name: Fervid Coldsnap
921817150.description: Your Coldsnap grenades have an additional charge that recharges quicker on direct impact. The seeker spawned from Coldsnap grenades travels further.

1341199512.name: Devouring Rift
1341199512.description: Casting an empowering rift will grant you Devour. Damage dealt by you and your allies from within your empowering rift will disrupt combatants.

1457189155.name: Depths of Duskfield
1457189155.description: Your Duskfield grenades have a much larger effect radius. Allies inside the Duskfield take reduced damage and targets inside the area deal reduced damage.

3556461530.name: Voltaic Mirror
3556461530.description: Attacks you redirect with your Arc staff deal massively increased damage and generate Orbs of Power for your allies. Guarding with your Whirlwind Guard Super does not consume extra Super energy.

2471523345.name: Glacial Fortification
2471523345.description: When using the Stasis subclass, your Barricade becomes a wall of Stasis crystals that slows nearby targets when created. Standing behind this barricade will grant you and your allies increased weapon reload speed, stability, and range.

1163213078.name: Cauterizing Flame
1163213078.description: When you are critically wounded with full class ability energy or when you cast a Barricade, create a Sunspot at your location that has improved restoration effects.

2392155347.name: Uniformed Officer
2392155347.description: Grants additional Psychogenic Intel when completing activities.

3115540150.name: Sweet Embrace
3115540150.description: Equip this armor ornament to change the appearance of Omnioculus. Once you get an ornament, it's unlocked for all characters on your account.

599904805.name: Tekeli-li
599904805.description: Equip this armor ornament to change the appearance of Star-Eater Scales. Once you get an ornament, it's unlocked for all characters on your account.

3472374302.name: Trace of the Throne
3472374302.description: Equip this armor ornament to change the appearance of Citan's Ramparts. Once you get an ornament, it's unlocked for all characters on your account.

2471221568.name: Terminus Emissary
2471221568.description: Equip this armor ornament to change the appearance of Cuirass of the Falling Star. Once you get an ornament, it's unlocked for all characters on your account.

2316352266.name: Nouveau Filigree
2316352266.description: Equip this armor ornament to change the appearance of Necrotic Grip. Once you get an ornament, it's unlocked for all characters on your account.

3192251706.name: Homespun Boots
3192251706.description: Equip this armor ornament to change the appearance of Boots of the Assembler. Once you get an ornament, it's unlocked for all characters on your account.

2722573683.name: Shadowshot: Deadfall
2722573683.description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

The Void Anchors fired from Shadowshot pull targets toward the impact point, which then become traps and wait for prey. Void Anchors have increased range and last longer.

2722573682.name: Spectral Blades
2722573682.description:
Summon a pair of deadly Void blades and stalk the battlefield in a veil of shadows.
[Light Attack]  : Perform a quick melee attack.
[Heavy Attack]  : Perform a heavy attack and once again vanish from sight.

2722573681.name: Shadowshot: Moebius Quiver
2722573681.description:
Tether foes to a Void Anchor, weakening and suppressing them for you and your allies.

Fire two volleys of three Void Arrows that seek nearby targets. Shadowshot makes targets volatile and deals increased damage to tethered targets. Defeating tethered targets creates Orbs of Power.

4260353953.name: Ward of Dawn
4260353953.description: Create an indestructible dome to protect you and your allies. Passing through Ward of Dawn grants you and your allies a temporary increase to weapon damage.

4260353952.name: Sentinel Shield
4260353952.description:
[Super]  : Summon a shield of Void Light. 
While Sentinel Shield is active:
[Light Attack]  : Attack.
[Block]  : Block.
[Grenade]  : Perform a Shield Throw.

Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and guarding allies makes the shield last longer.

1656118680.name: Nova Warp
1656118680.description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.
[Super Secondary]  : Teleport a short distance.
[Super Primary]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption.

1656118681.name: Nova Bomb: Vortex
1656118681.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb creates a singularity that pulls targets inward and continually damages those trapped inside.

1656118682.name: Nova Bomb: Cataclysm
1656118682.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb travels slowly and seeks targets. Detonations shatter into smaller seeker projectiles.

1139822081.name: Snare Bomb
1139822081.description: Throw a Smoke Bomb, which attaches to surfaces and pings enemy radar. Weakens targets on detonation.

4220332375.name: Shield Bash
4220332375.description: After sprinting for a short time, use this melee ability to unleash a devastating Shield Bash that suppresses the target. Final blows with Shield Bash grant an Overshield.

4220332374.name: Shield Throw
4220332374.description: Hurl your Void Shield toward a target. The shield can ricochet off targets and surfaces, granting Overshield for each target hit.

2299867342.name: Pocket Singularity
2299867342.description: Launch an unstable ball of Void energy that detonates when it nears a target, pushing them away from the blast and making them volatile.

1255073825.name: Void Spike
1255073825.description: A grenade that attaches to any surface and emits a torrent of damaging Void Light.

2809141585.name: Void Wall
2809141585.description: A grenade that creates a horizontal wall of burning Void Light.

2265076177.name: Suppressor Grenade
2265076177.description: An explosive grenade that suppresses, preventing targets from using abilities for a short time.

1016030582.name: Vortex Grenade
1016030582.description: A grenade that creates a Vortex that pulls targets inward and continually damages those trapped inside.

1514173218.name: Scatter Grenade
1514173218.description: A grenade that splits into many submunitions and covers a large area with multiple explosions.

1547656727.name: Magnetic Grenade
1547656727.description: A grenade that attaches to targets and explodes twice.

3232422679.name: Axion Bolt
3232422679.description: A bolt of Void Light that forks on impact into smaller bolts that seek out targets.

20616658.name: High Jump
20616658.description: While airborne, jump a second time to reach greater heights.

20616659.name: Strafe Jump
20616659.description: While airborne, jump a second time with strong directional control.

20616656.name: Triple Jump
20616656.description: While airborne, sustain your air control with a second or third jump.

1380268166.name: High Lift
1380268166.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air to greater heights.

1380268167.name: Strafe Lift
1380268167.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.

1380268164.name: Catapult Lift
1380268164.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.

1237488987.name: Strafe Glide
1237488987.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.

1237488986.name: Burst Glide
1237488986.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.

1237488985.name: Balanced Glide
1237488985.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.

1237488984.name: Blink
1237488984.description: Jump while airborne to teleport a short distance.

2816982784.name: Marksman's Dodge
2816982784.description: Dodge to perform an evasive maneuver with a steady hand. Dodging automatically reloads your weapon.

2816982785.name: Gambler's Dodge
2816982785.description: Dodge to perform a deft tumble, avoiding enemy attacks. Dodging near enemies fully recharges your Melee Ability.

2722641740.name: Towering Barricade
2722641740.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.

2722641741.name: Rally Barricade
2722641741.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases weapon reload speed, stability, and range when you stand behind it.

2209081649.name: Healing Rift
2209081649.description: Conjure a well of power that continuously heals those inside it.

2209081648.name: Empowering Rift
2209081648.description: Conjure a well of power that increases weapon damage for those inside it.

1091850348.name: Capsule Gang Entrance
1091850348.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

1091850349.name: Signal Intercept
1091850349.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

2425962977.name: Lucent Shrieker Entrance
2425962977.description: Modifications for your ship's transmat systems, so you'll always arrive in style.

2371951502.name: Hive Ghostly Projection
2371951502.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

2371951503.name: Witch Queen Projection
2371951503.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

2371951500.name: Memory of Bruce Projection
2371951500.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

2371951501.name: Hourglass Projection
2371951501.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

2371951498.name: Risen Projection
2371951498.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

2934252066.name: Trophy Projection
2934252066.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

2934252067.name: Laurel Wreath Projection
2934252067.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

503394676.name: Traveler Projection
503394676.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

4048492909.name: Defender Projection
4048492909.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

537464956.name: Drifter Projection
537464956.description: Equip this item to change your Ghost's projection.

375052469.name: Golden Gun - Deadshot
375052469.description:
Summon a rapid-fire flaming pistol that disintegrates targets with Solar Light.

Causing Solar ignitions while your Super is active refunds a Golden Gun round.

Benefits from being radiant.

375052468.name: Golden Gun - Marksman
375052468.description:
Summon a precision flaming pistol that disintegrates targets with Solar Light.

Your Golden Gun deals massively increased precision damage, overpenetrates targets, and creates Orbs of Power on precision hits.

Benefits from being radiant.

375052471.name: Blade Barrage
375052471.description: Vault into the air and unleash a volley of Solar-charged explosive knives.

2747500761.name: Hammer of Sol
2747500761.description:
Summon a flaming hammer and wreak destruction down upon your enemies.

[Light Attack]  : Throw your hammer at foes.

Upon impact, your hammers shatter into explosive molten shards.

2747500760.name: Burning Maul
2747500760.description:
Summon a flaming maul and crush your enemies with the force of an earthquake.

[Light Attack]  : Spin the maul in a circle around you, damaging nearby targets.

[Heavy Attack]  : Slam the maul to the ground and create a cyclone of flames that seeks targets.

2274196886.name: Daybreak
2274196886.description:
Fashion Solar Light into blades and smite your foes from the sky.

Your Daybreak projectiles launch a streak of deadly flames on impact.

2274196887.name: Well of Radiance
2274196887.description: Thrust your Sword into the ground, damaging and scorching nearby targets. The Sword projects a continuous aura, granting restoration and radiant effects to nearby allies, protecting them from the effects of Stasis.

4016776974.name: Lightweight Knife
4016776974.description: Quickly throw a knife that deals moderate damage. Precision hits with this knife make you radiant for a short duration.

4016776975.name: Weighted Throwing Knife
4016776975.description:
Throw a knife that deals extra precision damage and causes scorched targets to ignite.

Precision final blows with this knife immediately recharge your class ability.

4016776972.name: Knife Trick
4016776972.description: Throw a fan of flaming knives that scorch targets on hit.

4016776973.name: Proximity Explosive Knife
4016776973.description: Throw a knife that attaches to surfaces upon impact and explodes when it detects a nearby target.

852252788.name: Hammer Strike
852252788.description:
After sprinting for a short time, use this melee ability to swing a blazing hammer that scorches your target and deals damage in a cone behind them.

If your target is defeated by Hammer Strike, they ignite.

852252789.name: Throwing Hammer
852252789.description: Throw a hammer from a distance. Picking up a thrown hammer fully recharges your melee ability. If the hammer struck a target, picking it up grants cure.

1470370539.name: Celestial Fire
1470370539.description: Send out a spiral of three explosive Solar energy blasts, scorching targets with each hit.

1470370538.name: Incinerator Snap
1470370538.description: Snap your fingers to create a fan of burning sparks that explode and scorch targets.

2946990961.name: Tripmine Grenade
2946990961.description: An explosive grenade that sticks to surfaces and detonates when targets pass through its laser trigger, dealing damage and moderately scorching them.

3969294337.name: Thermite Grenade
3969294337.description: A grenade that sends forth a burning line of fire, dealing damage and scorching targets in its path.

2581086849.name: Incendiary Grenade
2581086849.description: A grenade that explodes in a fiery burst and heavily scorches nearby targets.

2216698406.name: Solar Grenade
2216698406.description: A grenade that creates a flare of Solar Light that continuously damages and scorches targets trapped inside.

3199702642.name: Swarm Grenade
3199702642.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, releasing multiple drones that seek nearby targets. Each drone slightly scorches affected targets.

1013086087.name: Fusion Grenade
1013086087.description: An explosive grenade that attaches to targets, damaging and moderately scorching them on detonation.

2202441959.name: Firebolt Grenade
2202441959.description: A grenade that unleashes bolts of damaging Solar Light at nearby targets and slightly scorches them.

1841016428.name: Healing Grenade
1841016428.description: A grenade that cures allies on impact and creates an Orb of benevolent Solar Light, granting restoration to allies when picked up.

3636300854.name: Marksman's Dodge
3636300854.description: Dodge to perform an evasive maneuver with a steady hand. Dodging automatically reloads your weapon.

3636300855.name: Gambler's Dodge
3636300855.description: Dodge to perform a deft tumble, avoiding enemy attacks. Dodging near enemies fully recharges your Melee Ability.

3636300852.name: Acrobat's Dodge
3636300852.description: Dodge to perform an acrobatic leap. Upon landing, make yourself and nearby allies radiant.

2495523340.name: Towering Barricade
2495523340.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.

2495523341.name: Rally Barricade
2495523341.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases weapon reload speed, stability, and range when you stand behind it.

2979486803.name: Healing Rift
2979486803.description: Conjure a well of power that continuously heals those inside it.

2979486802.name: Empowering Rift
2979486802.description: Conjure a well of power that increases weapon damage for those inside it.

2979486801.name: Phoenix Dive
2979486801.description:
Dive to the ground and create a burst of Solar Light that cures nearby allies.

While Heat Rises is active, you gain restoration while diving and scorch targets upon landing.

1128768654.name: High Jump
1128768654.description: While airborne, jump a second time to reach greater heights.

1128768655.name: Strafe Jump
1128768655.description: While airborne, jump a second time with strong directional control.

1128768652.name: Triple Jump
1128768652.description: While airborne, sustain your air control with a second or third jump.

2225231092.name: High Lift
2225231092.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air to greater heights.

2225231093.name: Strafe Lift
2225231093.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.

2225231094.name: Catapult Lift
2225231094.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.

3686638443.name: Strafe Glide
3686638443.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.

3686638442.name: Burst Glide
3686638442.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.

3686638441.name: Balanced Glide
3686638441.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.

2641107734.name: Unrepentant
2641107734.description: Reloading after defeating a target causes the next burst to be a longer, more powerful superburst.

1100877327.name: Exhumation
1100877327.description: Heavy attacks made with full Sword energy turn you invisible and fire exploding Void projectiles.

1579862386.name: Unrepentant
1579862386.description: Reloading after defeating a target causes the next burst to be a longer, more powerful superburst.

1271851280.name: Be the Danger
1271851280.description: Final blows with Unrepentant superbursts automatically reload your weapon and provide an Unrepentant superburst.

1563633475.name: Exhumation
1563633475.description: Heavy attacks made with full Sword energy turn you invisible and fire exploding Void projectiles.

873883409.name: Shot in the Dark
873883409.description:
Remaining invisible grants this weapon increased damage for a brief duration.

Hitting a target with this weapon's projectiles while Shot in the Dark is active weakens them.

2997472817.name: Osmosis
2997472817.description: Using your grenade ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your subclass until you stow it.

744594675.name: Well-Rounded
744594675.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.

2139363611.name: Well-Rounded
2139363611.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants an improved stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.

4293542123.name: Incandescent
4293542123.description:
Defeating a target spreads scorch to those nearby.
More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.

2675184851.name: Incandescent
2675184851.description:
Defeating a target spreads a longer lasting scorch to those nearby.
More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.

776531651.name: Repulsor Brace
776531651.description: Defeating a Void-debuffed target grants an overshield.

2541826827.name: Repulsor Brace
2541826827.description: Defeating a Void-debuffed target grants an overshield that lasts for an improved duration.

2451262963.name: Fragile Focus
2451262963.description: This weapon gains bonus range until the wielder takes damage. The bonus returns when no damage is taken for a short duration.

1609056795.name: Fragile Focus
1609056795.description: This weapon gains bonus range until the wielder takes damage. The bonus returns when no damage is taken for a shorter duration.

557221067.name: Killing Tally
557221067.description: Kills increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded.

2896748467.name: Killing Tally
2896748467.description: Final blows increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded. Improves magazine size.

1380061575.name: Dream Work
1380061575.description: Once per reload, assists or assisted final blows partially refill the weapon from reserves, potentially overflowing the magazine.

1905044254.name: To Excess
1905044254.description: Final blows with this weapon while your Super is full grant a bonus to Strength and Discipline for a moderate duration.

1250481499.name: Extrovert
1250481499.description: Final blows while near multiple combatants or near Nightmares restores health.

4154828211.name: Bitterspite
4154828211.description:
While this weapon is equipped, taking damage accelerates its next reload.

Taking more damage increases the effect.

114225848.name: Springtime Scales
114225848.description: Equip this weapon ornament to change the appearance of Ager's Scepter. Once you get an ornament, it's unlocked for all characters on your account.

581152885.name: Electromagnetic Execution

2271511880.description: Grants 5% additional Vestiges of Dread from all sources. Each piece of armor you are wearing with this perk on it increases this bonus, to a maximum of 4 items (20%).

2179827240.name: Roast 'Em
2179827240.description:
Your Proximity Knife scorches targets it damages with its explosions, or ignites targets on final blow.

After throwing a Proximity Knife, you gain increased melee regeneration until the knife explodes.

1437147326.name: Myrmidon's Reach
1437147326.description: Gain a second charge of your Shield Throw melee, which becomes shield-piercing and stuns [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

4222205045.name: Soaring Fusilier
4222205045.description: Air dodge reloads all of your weapons and improves the airborne effectiveness of Fusion Rifles and Linear Fusion Rifles; final blows with these weapons make you radiant. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Fusion Rifles and Linear Fusion Rifles.
