1155950691.name: Knitting Project
1155950691.description: Knitted pattern will change based on current Guardian class.

3769507633.name: Arc Staff
3769507633.description:
Form a staff of pure Arc energy and acrobatically take out your foes.

[Block] : Hold to deflect incoming projectiles with your Arc staff.

3769507632.name: Gathering Storm
3769507632.description:
Hurl your Arc Staff forward, embedding it into surfaces or large targets and jolting nearby targets.

After a short time, a devastating lightning bolt strikes the staff, overcharging it with Arc energy. While overcharged, your staff discharges lightning at nearby foes.

119041299.name: Fists of Havoc
119041299.description:
Supercharge your fists and slam the ground with the force of a maelstrom. While active:

[Light Attack]  : Quickly charge forward, dealing damage to any impacted targets.

[Heavy Attack] : Slam your fists to the ground, dealing damage in an area around you and leaving aftershocks in your wake. Performing a slam from the air deals additional damage.

119041298.name: Thundercrash
119041298.description: Hurtle through the air like a missile and crash into targets to inflict meteoric damage.

1081893460.name: Stormtrance
1081893460.description:
Chain Arc Lightning from your hands to electrify targets with devastating streams of Arc Light that intensify over time. Casting Stormtrance creates a shockwave underneath you.

[Sprint]  : Teleport forward, consuming a small amount of Super energy.

1081893461.name: Chaos Reach
1081893461.description:
Unleash a long-range channeled beam of concentrated Arc energy.

 [Super]  while active to deactivate your Super early, saving Super energy.

2716335211.name: Combination Blow
2716335211.description:
A quick strike that temporarily increases your melee damage when defeating a target, stacking three times.

Defeating targets with this ability also fully refills your class ability energy and restores a small amount of health.

2716335210.name: Disorienting Blow
2716335210.description: Striking an enemy with this melee ability Blinds them and Amplifies you.

2708585277.name: Seismic Strike
2708585277.description:
After sprinting for a short time, activate your charged melee ability to slam shoulder-first into your target, damaging and Blinding enemies in an area around them.

While you are Amplified, the Blind radius is increased.

2708585276.name: Ballistic Slam
2708585276.description: After sprinting and while airborne, activate your charged melee ability to slam to the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

2708585279.name: Thunderclap
2708585279.description:
[Melee] : Hold while grounded to plant your feet and begin charging your fist with Arc energy.

[Melee] : Release to unleash a devastating blast in front of you, dealing damage that increases with longer charge time.

1232050830.name: Ball Lightning
1232050830.description:
Fire an Arc projectile forward that releases a perpendicular lightning strike after a short time.

While Amplified, Ball Lightning releases additional lightning strikes before detonating.

1232050831.name: Chain Lightning
1232050831.description:
An extended range melee that Jolts your target and chains lightning to nearby enemies.

While Amplified, it creates an additional set of chains.

2994412667.name: Lightning Grenade
2994412667.description: A grenade that sticks to any surface and emits bolts of lightning.

2481624867.name: Storm Grenade
2481624867.description: A grenade that calls down a focused lightning storm.

2909720723.name: Flashbang Grenade
2909720723.description: An explosive grenade that damages and blinds nearby targets.

1713935764.name: Pulse Grenade
1713935764.description: A grenade that periodically damages targets within its explosion radius.

146194908.name: Skip Grenade
146194908.description: A grenade that splits upon impact, creating multiple projectiles that seek targets.

4198689901.name: Flux Grenade
4198689901.description: An explosive grenade that attaches to targets.

1582574009.name: Arcbolt Grenade
1582574009.description: A grenade that chains bolts of lightning to nearby targets.

426473316.name: Marksman's Dodge
426473316.description: Dodge to perform an evasive maneuver with a steady hand. Dodging automatically reloads your weapon.

426473317.name: Gambler's Dodge
426473317.description: Dodge to perform a deft tumble, avoiding enemy attacks. Dodging near enemies fully recharges your Melee Ability.

489583096.name: Towering Barricade
489583096.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.

489583097.name: Rally Barricade
489583097.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases weapon reload speed, stability, and range when you stand behind it.

489583098.name: Thruster
489583098.description: While grounded, quickly evade in a lateral direction.

25156515.name: Healing Rift
25156515.description: Conjure a well of power that continuously heals those inside it.

25156514.name: Empowering Rift
25156514.description: Conjure a well of power that increases weapon damage for those inside it.

95544330.name: High Jump
95544330.description: While airborne, jump a second time to reach greater heights.

95544331.name: Strafe Jump
95544331.description: While airborne, jump a second time with strong directional control.

95544328.name: Triple Jump
95544328.description: While airborne, sustain your air control with a second or third jump.

95544329.name: Blink
95544329.description: Jump while airborne to teleport a short distance.

1698387814.name: High Lift
1698387814.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air to greater heights.

1698387815.name: Strafe Lift
1698387815.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.

1698387812.name: Catapult Lift
1698387812.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.

4154539169.name: Strafe Glide
4154539169.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.

4154539168.name: Burst Glide
4154539168.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.

4154539171.name: Balanced Glide
4154539171.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.

1291268260.description:
This mod's perks are only active in the "King's Fall" raid.

Multiple copies of this mod stack and improve its effects.

400659041.description: Grants 5% additional Treasure Coordinates from all sources. Each piece of armor you are wearing with this perk on it increases this bonus, to a maximum of 4 items (20%).

3809192347.name: See Me, Feel Me
3809192347.description: Your weapons gain a bonus to damage briefly after you emerge from being invisible. When you are invisible and defeat a combatant using a finisher, you and your nearby allies gain a reserve overshield and improved class ability regen. These reserve overshields can be deployed by using a class ability.

1969105489.name: Hammer of the Gods
1969105489.description: Defeating targets with your Thunderclap melee restores melee energy. Targets near you when you use your Thunderclap suffer lightning strikes; being amplified increases the range of these lightning strikes.

1376049785.name: Ionic Conductor
1376049785.description: Ionic traces you create move faster and grant you additional ability energy. Nearby allies also gain ability energy when you collect an ionic trace.

2585427437.name: Traitor's Vessel
2585427437.description:
Fires a wide horizontal spread when shot from the hip.
Final blows with this weapon have a chance to generate Ionic Traces. Powerful foes and opposing Guardians always generate Ionic Traces.

3602718766.name: Rocket Tracers
3602718766.description: Landing multiple hits turns your next shot into a homing micro-rocket.

2724693746.name: Touch of Malice
2724693746.description: The final round in the magazine deals bonus damage, drawing from the wielder's life force, and then regenerates itself. Rapidly defeating three targets restores health.

1208312843.name: Tempest Cascade
1208312843.description: Collecting an Ionic Trace overcharges this weapon's next shot, jolting targets on hit.

1365187766.name: Gutshot Straight
1365187766.description: Aiming down sights increases body shot damage, decreases target acquisition.

4200236906.name: Gutshot Straight
4200236906.description: Aiming down sights increases body shot damage but decreases target acquisition slightly.

1870851715.name: Under-Over
1870851715.description: Deals bonus damage to targets with overshields. Deals a small amount of bonus damage to combatant shields.

183938251.name: Under-Over
183938251.description: Deals improved bonus damage to targets with overshields. Deals a small amount of bonus damage to combatant shields.

1821614984.name: Slickdraw
1821614984.description: Significantly increases handling, significantly decreases target acquisition.

1942880504.name: Slickdraw
1942880504.description: Significantly increases handling, decreases target acquisition.

691659142.description:
Final blows with this weapon generate melee energy. 
Dealing melee damage briefly improves this weapon's handling.

536173722.description:
Final blows with this weapon generate improved melee energy. 
Dealing melee damage briefly improves this weapon's handling.

1720528630.name: Voltshot
1720528630.description: Reloading this weapon after defeating a target overcharges this weapon for an improved short period of time, causing it to jolt on its next hit.

2094939076.name: Charged with Blight
2094939076.description: Precision hits drain combatants' life force and charge up a ball of darkness. [Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to unleash the blight projectile, shrouding combatants in darkness and temporarily blinding them.

2250679103.name: Search Party
2250679103.description: This weapon is granted faster aim down sights speed and movement speed while aiming down sights when no allies are near.

1260401931.name: Hot Swap
1260401931.description:
Switching to this weapon while you are damaged strongly increases its handling for a short duration.

Swords gain increased charge speed, guard resistance, and guard endurance instead.

120721526.name: Runneth Over
120721526.description: Reloading near allies overflows the magazine.

3907865655.name: Right Hook
3907865655.description:
Dealing melee damage gives this weapon increased target acquisition and range for a short period of time.
Dealing melee damage again extends the effect.
